ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
python_min:
- '3.10'

about.description:
Viewflow takes the best parts from two worlds. It is based on BPMN -
business process modeling and notation standard - and plays well with the
django web development toolchain. BPMN provides a standard notation,
readily understandable by all business stakeholders. Viewflow bridges
the gap between a picture and an executable, ready to use web application.

commands: python -c "import django; from django.conf import settings; settings.configure(DEBUG=True,INSTALLED_APPS=['viewflow']); django.setup(); import viewflow; import viewflow.apps; import viewflow.conf; import viewflow.contrib; import viewflow.fields; import viewflow.forms; import viewflow.fsm; import viewflow.jsonstore; import viewflow.locale; import viewflow.management; import viewflow.middleware; import viewflow.static; import viewflow.templates; import viewflow.templatetags; import viewflow.urls; import viewflow.utils; import viewflow.views; import viewflow.workflow"

about.description:
Viewflow takes the best parts from two worlds. It is based on BPMN -
business process modeling and notation standard - and plays well with the
django web development toolchain. BPMN provides a standard notation,
readily understandable by all business stakeholders. Viewflow bridges
the gap between a picture and an executable, ready to use web application.

commands: python -c "import django; from django.conf import settings; settings.configure(DEBUG=True,INSTALLED_APPS=['viewflow']); django.setup(); import viewflow; import viewflow.apps; import viewflow.conf; import viewflow.contrib; import viewflow.fields; import viewflow.forms; import viewflow.fsm; import viewflow.jsonstore; import viewflow.locale; import viewflow.management; import viewflow.middleware; import viewflow.static; import viewflow.templates; import viewflow.templatetags; import viewflow.urls; import viewflow.utils; import viewflow.views; import viewflow.workflow"

name: django-viewflow
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "django-viewflow" %}
{% set version = "2.2.15" %}
{% set python_min = "3.10" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name | replace('-', '_') }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 8b9714d7736969289e037c739bc1e20a143c525b3d087a7bce349a5f6b4f53e0

build:
  noarch: python
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv --no-deps --no-build-isolation
  number: 0

requirements:
  host:
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - pip
    - setuptools
  run:
    - python >={{ python_min }}
    - django >=4.2
    - django-filter >=2.3.0

test:
  commands:
    - python -c "import django; from django.conf import settings; settings.configure(DEBUG=True,INSTALLED_APPS=['viewflow']); django.setup(); import viewflow; import viewflow.apps; import viewflow.conf; import viewflow.contrib; import viewflow.fields; import viewflow.forms; import viewflow.fsm; import viewflow.jsonstore;
      import viewflow.locale; import viewflow.management; import viewflow.middleware; import viewflow.static; import viewflow.templates; import viewflow.templatetags; import viewflow.urls; import viewflow.utils; import viewflow.views; import viewflow.workflow"
    - pip check
  requires:
    - pip
    - python {{ python_min }}

about:
  home: http://viewflow.io/
  license: AGPL-3.0-or-later
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - LICENSE
    - LICENSE_EXCEPTION
    - LICENSE.django
  summary: 'Reusable workflow library for Django'
  description: |
    Viewflow takes the best parts from two worlds. It is based on BPMN - 
    business process modeling and notation standard - and plays well with the 
    django web development toolchain. BPMN provides a standard notation, 
    readily understandable by all business stakeholders. Viewflow bridges 
    the gap between a picture and an executable, ready to use web application.
  doc_url: http://docs.viewflow.io/
  dev_url: https://github.com/viewflow/viewflow/

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - cshaley
    - millsks
    - rxm7706
